website_summaries.verdict: An affordable organizer with enough room for everyday essentials. Ideal for personal front seat items or as a compact backseat organizer in vehicles with limited legroom.
pros: Multiple compartments in varying sizes keep smart devices, sunglasses, snacks, and bottles within easy reach
Deep pockets keep items from spilling out
cons: Overloading the pockets can cause sagging

customer_reviews.title: Great for bus traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great! Took this on a 4 day bus tour and it worked great! On tour buses there is never any place to put stuff like drink, snack, books, maps, iPad,phone etc. This worked great. Loved it. It is not long, so doesn't get in the way of the knees in the tight spaces. Pockets open wide and held two of the big insulated stainless steel drinking glasses. No more turned over drinks! I am going on a longer trip next year and am ordering more for Christmas gifts for my travel buddies!
customer_reviews.author: Valton Dean Reding

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Road Trips and Travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for little kids or teens to organize items on road trips. We have five kids so I purchased some of these for the kids while on road trips since they always tend to lose something, whether it be a hand game game cartridge, cell phone, book, etc. This is great to help them keep and organize their stuff in a central location. It does not interfere with the head space of the person sitting in the seat in front. It's easily to assemble and take down. I'm guessing you could wash with warm soap and water and air dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: Not for SUV
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work quite as well in an SUV. Doesn't look as neat as it does in the picture, a bit "flimsy".
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for people who work out of the car.
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my car and this thing is great. I use it facing forward on my passenger seat to hold little odds and ends (gloves, pens, tools, etc) and it does take up as much space as a full seat version. Also super easy to take off in case someone needs to sit there.
customer_reviews.author: RTF1313

customer_reviews.title: Product As Described
customer_reviews.text: I'm an outside sales executive and this is perfect to store a multitude of things that I may need at my fingertips, either while driving or pulled over on a conference call. It swings out of the way fairly easily when I have a passenger. Items stay put when you have to lock up the brakes😉
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Johns

customer_reviews.title: Grateful Grandma out of the Clutter
customer_reviews.text: I am a grateful grandma of a 2 year old grandson-that being said my car was always trashed with "stuff". That is until I purchased my car organizer, I strapped mine to the front seat headrest so I can easily grab snacks, juice-pen paper check book-you name it, I feel organized again !!! It's the little things that help-I'm looking into a second purchase for the trunk!! Love it thank you Lebogner,for simplifying my life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product and fast delivery. The only thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made product and fast delivery. The only thing I see wrong with it, is when you get all your stuff in it, that it's hard to get thru the back seat, as it hangs out kind of far. It could also be that I have a smaller vehicle as in a Honda CRV. I think if it had a strap around the bottom, that it wouldn't dangle out as far.
customer_reviews.author: Nonee

customer_reviews.title: Car organizer
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. After I filled the middle pocket it got a little droopy. So I took some cardboard cut out the shape and glued it to the back. Now it's nice and sturdy. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: droopy...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to keep it in the shape shown in the listing photos. It's holding on to the headrest fine, but has drooped after a couple months and it's only holding some paper, pens, hand lotion, a small bottle of ibuprofen... Nothing heavy. It might help to add an organizer box or bin to the largest compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product for the following reasons: 1. No solid backing to support it. 2. Front pockets are too small and sag. 3. The strap used to secure it to the headrest should be adjustable from the sides as the plastic clip rests on the headset bars and because of this I can not center the unit. 4. Netting is too shallow. Item has gone on to it's unhappy place into the community trash container.
customer_reviews.author: George Francis

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: My stuff just droops in this thing. It looks ugly. My compact umbrella hangs out at a weird angle and the few things I have in it --- small dog dish, lint brush and some other small items -- just do not fit. The picture sure seems different than my reality. I am going to have to get rid of it as it just looks junky dangling in mid air with my items jutting out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material, but the price is cheap
customer_reviews.text: It's as expected. Extra pockets to give me more storage in my car. The strap is a buckle that wraps around the head rest area. I did spend some time adjusting the strap length, so that the back of my head won't hit the buckle. I think that this product would be better if it was just a strap without buckles (hence minus one star).
customer_reviews.author: Toddler Mom

customer_reviews.title: Getting in and out of the backset just got easier.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this organizer does not reduce the amount of leg space. I had one prior and the kids kept sticking their feet in the pockets while getting in and out of the car. This is a much cleaner look than the full size one. I can even reach behind the front passenger and grab a bottle of water for myself. I bought two for my car and one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty James

customer_reviews.title: Holds two drinks
customer_reviews.text: This holds everything I need on a trip. It holds two drinks, phone, phone cord, tissues, and more. I sat in the back seat of a car and hung this over the front seat head rest. It was not in the way, and worked well. This should also work well to hold my drink, etc. on bus tours.
customer_reviews.author: MaryD

customer_reviews.title: Compact & Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks small I was surprised it fit everything from my old one that took up the entire length of my backseat! I even had more room for other items. Made out of sturdy materials. Love it! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: PugMomma

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a different car (van to a SUV) and needed something to hold my odds and ends that previously were in the pockets and cubbies of my van. This holds everything, even my kleenex, and I usually just sit it in the passenger seat next to me so I can easily grab anything out of it. It never falls over, just sits there like a good traveling companion! It was the perfect choice for me. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly! What I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a little extra storage for extra sunglasses and a few extra things that were in my backseat. I wanted something that was behind my passenger seat and would be small and hidden. This is perfect. The straps hide under my head rests so they font even show! I have high back seats in my Camaro SS and I'm extremely picky about what's in my car. I couldn't have planned this any better! Its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Rideshare drivers/families.
customer_reviews.text: I drive for Uber and Lyft and wanted something a little extra to offer, so I decided to purchase this. It is easy to install and the right size to hold drinks, phones, notebook computers, etc. It seems pretty durable as well. I would recommend this product for any rideshare driver, or family to organize and have easy access for people in the back seats. It's not a huge full seat organizer, but for the cost it's really a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Lindemuth

customer_reviews.title: It's not a total waste.
customer_reviews.text: Ok.... It doesn't sit flat. I had to clip it in the middle so it turned the middle compartment into two, which helped. I'm giving it three stars because it holds quite a bit and still gets the job done. I didn't want a full size back seat organizer because they take up too much leg room. All in all, I'm happy. Maybe I can somehow create a hard study wall in the back 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: My new car has fewer cubby holes to store things so I bought this and am happy with it. It's not too large but has plenty of room for coupons, Kleenex, hat, plastic ware, emergency kids' clean-up items, etc. I have it hanging in front on the passenger seat and it easily swings around to back if I have a passenger. It is hanging quite flat instead of bulging but I've only been using it a week so???
customer_reviews.author: deb O

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: As an uber/Lyft driver. I always looking for ways that I can organize the backseat. I especially like this product because it clips to the headrest and makes my giveaways suuuuper easy to see
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It is a perfect size for our needs
customer_reviews.text: I got this organizer for a trip I am taking in the next two weeks. I have a Subaru wagon and I've attached it to the back of the driver seat so that the passenger can grab anything needed such as tissues lens cleaner iPad iPhone etc. It is a perfect size for our needs. if I had a family I would probably want a larger one but for two people it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Boutin

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The picture is misleading. How it's made it would not go on the back of the seat and hold items. It just leaned and things fell out. So I had to just sit it on the floor. Which defeats the purpose. If you are looking for a sturdy organizer this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: L.V. Colley

customer_reviews.title: and everybody will be more safe and happy.
customer_reviews.text: Neat and clean way to store and organize extra stuff. Drivers should concentrate on safe driving, and should not be distracted by loose items. Loose items could interfere with driver and driver controls such as hand controls, steering wheel, and foot pedals. Roll away loose water bottle could bind up behind a brake pedal. Put it all in both set or set's of Lebogner car organizers, and everybody will be more safe and happy.
customer_reviews.author: tim mesler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!! PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect! It holds my schedule notepads pencils pens CDs gum hand sanitizer and everything that I need handy and not rolling around or falling off my front seat! Dividers are movable too which I love. Made my front seat organized and me less stressed! Extremely happy I purchased this one!! Awesome! You won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Klee

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for me
customer_reviews.text: I go on a lot of bus trips.. I will be using it next month... It will be the right size and not in the way on a trip. Plan to use it in my car also. There is a pocket for your I pad two larger pockets below for other things. Two more pockets in front of them and two pockets on the side. It can hold a lot of things. Just the right size for me. It smells when you take it out of the bag, but goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Peebles

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ORGANIZER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! Keeps my car neat and everything is easily accessible. I placed it on the front passenger seat and when I am alone I face it forward. When I have a passenger I simply turn it to the rear of the seat. Highly recommend....delivery was quick and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of pockets and space. The only thing I do not like (and I knew this going in) is the lack of any type of tie down to secure the bottom of the organizer. I use this in conjunction with a tablet holder that mounts behind the front headrest. Great to store earbuds, iPod, cell phone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: R. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its has nearly no stability. Tried it as soon as we drove a 200 mile trip and even though it was easy to install, it DOES NOT hold its stability well at all. Needs some kind of an extra strap on the bottom, to keep it steady.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Panousis

customer_reviews.title: Functions as Intended
customer_reviews.text: My car organizer arrived quickly and in good shape. I attached it to the front seat of my roadster convertible easily. So far, so good - it's holding my little windshield scraper, gloves, and a spare bottle of water at the moment. I would definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Busy B

customer_reviews.title: My travel companion and organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertise a great sturdy device with ample pockets. Like the ability to flip over the flap and carry over a shoulder. Have had a few other products that were too flimsy or insufficient pockets. This product is a true winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the organizer we needed for our upcoming road trip! This will allow the kids (10 & 7) to have easy access to the things they need to stay entertained without taking up floor and leg space with another bag. I really love the additional drink/bottle holders! Their water bottles don't fit on our regular drink holders in the door so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Schwind

customer_reviews.title: disapointing & small
customer_reviews.text: smaller than it looks, will not fit the headrest of a full size dodge ram, drink holders will not hold a 20oz bottle, cans and smaller water bottles only, I would spend a little more and get something better if I could.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the picture for realistic reference
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for about 7 months now M-F in a law enforcement capacity. The main storage pouch folds under its own weight and doesn’t hold what it claims to hold. It also sags down the middle a lot which isn’t what the picture represents. All in all glad I purchased because i literally use it everyday multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I travel on a lot of bus tours, the bus companies new buses do not have a pocket on the back of the seat. This product is ideal for this purpose, you can get so much in it. Water, IPad, phone and lots more! I bought upholstery pins to attach to bus seat. Great in the car too, excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit snug, bounces around
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed as my kids are getting older I wanted something to hold drink bottles, tablets, but they sway and bounce around, would be perfect if they were more snug. Will keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is so neat!
customer_reviews.text: My kids can put their little toys and wet tissues and so on. This organizer saves space and I was able to put lot of things neatly. Also, it seems durable since we used it for more than 6 months and it is still strong. My kids sometimes put their kids' size bottles and it still holds strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cloe

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The strap is adjustable, and the multiple pockets help me stay organized and keeps my front seat from being covered in things i need, Lip gloss, bluetooth,sanitizer etc. Over all I enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nina.D

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: It's good in the amount of items it holds. Water bottle pockets good for cans or bottles 20oz or less. The bottom does not secure to the seat, it only goes over the headrest. Holds my Surface Pro perfectly. I am using it for flying internationally. It's a great & cost effective way to have your necessities handy and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old. Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is great. I bought it for a long vacation car trip and it helped keep my daughters things organized and easy for her to grab. I like the fact it doesn't cover the entire back of the seat. Some like that end up hanging out from the seat and get in the way. This one does not. I ended up buying another for our other vehicle to use all the time. My daughter is 5 and loves being able to reach all of her stuff on her own.
customer_reviews.author: T.Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Behind the seat storage and still have leg room.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the back seat of my suv. I like to fold down the back seat and sleep in the back and have easy access to some water, flashlight, cell phone, etc. This fit the bill much better than other back seat organizers that extend too low down the seat for my back seat to fold down properly, and this one can stay in place and allow passengers plenty of leg room because it sits up high on the seatback.
customer_reviews.author: BigO

customer_reviews.title: Convenient organization
customer_reviews.text: I really like this car organizer. It allowed me to empty out my glovebox of sooo many things. The items are now very handy and easily reached.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brocato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for Christmas and he is very happy with it. It has helped him keep his truck nice and neat and organized. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for someone looking for a bit of organizational space.
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly. Was as advertised and is sturdy. I like that this product is short as I’m a shareride driver and the back seats can be difficult for adults to get into if this type of product goes down the height of the front seat. Yes, I use this facing the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Terragrub

customer_reviews.title: So perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: These have made life so much easier! We had no storage pockets or cup holders. These hold so much. We don't have head rests, but they work anyway. I put paper clip on the center middle pocket because they stuck out a little farther than I liked but work great. Wish I had seen the pretty color before I ordered these black ones.
customer_reviews.author: windowgalaz

customer_reviews.title: Clutter buster
customer_reviews.text: I used the organizer for a road trip, attaching as a front seat organizer. It kept maps, tour books, phone, snacks and miscellaneous items within easy reach and off the front seat. Looks like this solved my front seat clutter challenge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The organizer fit snug around the head rest. I was concerned that there my be slippage or movement, but the organizer stays in place with the one strap. I did not wanted something larger than this, and this fits the bill to keep smaller items all in one place and off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia O

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new vehicle and needed something to help organize my work material as I travel in my job. This organizer is absolutely perfect. It's well constructed with several size pockets and holders for quick access.
customer_reviews.author: Pageturner56

customer_reviews.title: It holds stuff though
customer_reviews.text: Its not as sturdy as they say, it sags in the middle like they said it wouldn't. If you fill every pocket it might not but I don't want to have to carry excess stuff I don't need to keep it from sagging.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all my car needs. I put CD’s in it, my umbrella, Kleenex, pad of paper with pencils, etc. Absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: orangess

customer_reviews.title: Keeps necessary things I need close at hand!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is half size from most of the other carriers. Fits perfectly in my car! I have to drive a moving truck over 1000 miles in 2 weeks and taking it with me in the truck!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for front or back seat
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for front or back seat and is good quality. I've bought a couple different styles and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Brady

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a Road Trip but we’re keeping it up
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the kids in the rear seats to store items during our road trip for 9 days. It helped keep things together and off the floor. I plan on keeping them up now that we’re home!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Organizer!  Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product! Good quality and the size is just right for my needs. Fits nicely along the back of the seat without being too long that it doesn't hit the legs of the person sitting in front of it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping things together in the RV
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and have used it one time on an RV trip. So far, so good. Helps keep phones, pens, remotes, etc. together in the RV. Seems to be very good quality. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: rrsflorida

customer_reviews.title: It seems sturdy and ready for the road
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the fast delivery. We are prepping for an RV road trip, leaving tomorrow...already installed in the RV and the pockets are getting filled. It seems sturdy and ready for the road.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra L. Cheek (mcheek8157@aol.com)

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I just received two days ago
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I just received two days ago. It fits nicely in the back of my car seat. The pockets are perfect for storing everyday needs. My daughter now has lotion, coloring pencils & other needs within reach. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice and work well
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and work well. I am going to insert a wood dowel in the top portion of it to make it stay straight like it is in the picture as everything tends to sag in the middle
customer_reviews.author: TexasFlyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product but it was not big enough for what I needed. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Silva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to use on the back of passenger seat for my Uber customers......small, many pockets and compartments, unobtrusive, and nice looking. Glad I bought it. John
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: another 1-2 inches would be great. I haven't had it totally packed yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have found the organizer to be what I expected with one small difference. The headrest strap is to me a little short, another 1-2 inches would be great. I haven't had it totally packed yet but it looks like it would take the task.
customer_reviews.author: summercut

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, I used it on our boat to keep little items of the dash. Modified the way it was intended to be mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Mike I

customer_reviews.title: Works for my car office
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my car as a social worker and needed something to keep my office supplies organized while on the road. This was a perfect solution for that! It has 5 compartments of different shapes and sizes and 2 bottle holders. I was expecting the top compartment to be large enough to hold files horizontally, but it is not. To, me that's a preference and does not effect the quality of the product. The strap is a bit short for my car seat. Wish they made a taller one!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan D. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect size to store their headphones and miscalanious junk
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly in our suburban for my 5 and 7 year old. I can't stand toys in the cup holders and on the floor. This is a perfect size to store their headphones and miscalanious junk. Easy to install and easy to remove. I'll have to buy another one when my 8 month old is old enough!
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. It was much smaller than I had orginally expected, but it's still big enough to fit what I need. I really love that it only hooks around the headrest so that it's easy to change it from hanging from in front of the seat to behind for when I have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRae

customer_reviews.title: Not high quality and fit leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it works. But, it doesn’t sit nice and secure against the seat as shown, You put a bottle on one side, it tends to want to tilt in that direction.
customer_reviews.author: nallenb

customer_reviews.title: A another hand
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it's le having another hand. Everything is right there in arms reach. Almost as helpful as google turning in my lights in the morning. Ok maybe a lil better it helps when I'm driving.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mata

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised, easy to install. Handy design, easy to reach everything. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: LibbySpencer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage options.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and gives passengers some place to keep their stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Kiess

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: smaller than it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was just barely big enough for what I needed to put in it. If you have a lot of things to organize, I would definitely skip this one and buy a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin' Robin

customer_reviews.title: It is too floppy and unstable to easily use. I had to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is too floppy and unstable to easily use. I had to figure out how to secure the bottom portion to the back of the seat so I didn't have to use both hands when loading or unloading an item. Just not "beefy" enough for my liking.
customer_reviews.author: stella03

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It made it easier to organize the items I need at an arms reach! Will be ordering more for our other cars!
customer_reviews.author: lauris

customer_reviews.title: Great for Uber
customer_reviews.text: I used to Uber and used this to hold treats, water, tissue and vomit bags. I loved it and got lots of compliments and extra tips. Highly recommend for anyone that has a sedan style car that Ubers/Lyfts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Work in Semi Trucks! Strap to short!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice organizer but the strap is very small. I got this for my husbands semi truck. Won’t Work. I’m gonna keep it for my car. I wish they had a longer strap on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine44

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for adults taking bus trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for adults taking bus trips...one day or many days. Fits over the headrest in front of you and holds plenty of items such as magazines, books, snacks, water bottles, cameras, iPads, cell phone, etc. All within easy reach. I have been looking for this size!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with the quality and only strap is for the headrest which is great. A lot of room for teenagers phones, cords and stuff. Hoping this will keep clutter down as teenagers and pre-teens seem to have. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Perfect depth so it sits above my “desk” in the front seat. Helps keep my tablet from falling on the floor along with other items. It’s exactly what I needed! Item came fast and in a box. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality thing here.
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing, the only con I would say is that if you put something like a water bottle in it, it does not stay flesh up against the back of your car seat, but rather, droops forward a bit. If this does not bother you, I'd say go for the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: Needed more organizing than just my front seat. Fits a large water bottle, phone charger, lotion and more.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice organizer. Just enough for a few things. Not the whole office.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. It adds extra storage for my kid's electronics and toys. It only has one strap on the top though and would have preferred it to come with another strap around the bottom for more security but overall I would recommend it to others. 👍
customer_reviews.author: mval

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. No issues so far. It holds a lot of stuff. I put my makeup, some facial tissue, chips and my water bottle. Love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: janne89

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy organizer. My new car doesn't have many places to put "stuff", so this sure helps with that. It's not so big as to take up leg room when it's in the back, but keeps everything at your fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Vern wooley

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it does NOT lay flat like the photo and is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at hundreds of organizers before buying this one. Looks exactly like picture. Plenty of room with lots of pockets without being too bulky. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse1776

customer_reviews.title: Storage
customer_reviews.text: The straps are not long enough. I need to find an extender
customer_reviews.author: estorms146

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, if it turns out to be otherwise
customer_reviews.text: We got a Jeep Renegade that my wife mostly drives. Since the Jeep has limited interior organizing/storage space, we got this to help that. It came when promised and is as described. So far so good, if it turns out to be otherwise, I'll edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing!!! I’ve had my car for 2 years. All my stuff rolls around the seat and floor until now. I don’t know why I never thought of buying this before. All my stuff is organized. I actually have it reversed so it hangs over the front of the passenger seat. 5 stars in my book!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stastny

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love this and definitely ordering another one. Plenty of room I'm it and the perfect size. Dosent get in the way at all like the others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Elmer

customer_reviews.title: nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: I travel with a small dog. all his stuff fits in this, so I'm not searching for his leash or other things. and its not all over, nice and neat. would buy again
customer_reviews.author: chewie

customer_reviews.title: Behind seat storage
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped, except...I wish it had a longer strap. I plan to try to use it on the back of a bus seat for travel, and I may have to find a way to add to the strap. Otherwise, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Murchison

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was a gift for my sister, she is happy.
customer_reviews.author: RMar

customer_reviews.title: These are great. More than enough pockets and storage space
customer_reviews.text: These are great. More than enough pockets and storage space. Fits nicely around the headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Lené

customer_reviews.title: Hangs well on seat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for Christmas presents. Works great, heavy fabric should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Alaine Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not luxury
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call this luxury at all. It feels very cheap but does function. It also doesn’t sit flat on my seat.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer!
customer_reviews.text: It's high enough on the back of the passenger seat that it doesn't interfere with the leg room of the back seat passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Madderom

customer_reviews.title: and this is perfect. I like that it's only half the length ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Lyft driver, and this is perfect. I like that it's only half the length of the back seat so people still have leg room.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Willis

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep my sons cars and books in without taking up leg room in the back seat. Working out well
customer_reviews.author: Amy Strubin

customer_reviews.title: This organizer works well, the only reason for the ...
customer_reviews.text: This organizer works well, the only reason for the 4 star is I wish there was a little more 'structure' to it. My front seats are air cooled and I was having a hard time finding an organizer that was high enough to not have an impact on the venting in the back of the seat, and this organizer fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight backseat organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, lightweight and adjustable backseat organizer for electronics, cords, toys and snacks for travel or just an on the go family!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Joy Taylor

product_meta.title: lebogner #1 Luxury CAR Organizer, Perfect Front Seat Organizer, Driver Organizer, Backseat Organizer, Car Seat Organizer for Kids, Black.

Would you like to have driving necessities close at hand and clutter under control?
Do you need somewhere to put your phone, tablet, sunglasses, tissues and water bottles?
Do you want to keep your front seat organized when your on the go for an enjoyable ride?

So if you are dealing with these sorts of problems and you want the problems solved and you want to make your life easier.

 The Lebogner Car Organizer is the answer!!!

Keep your all your travel necessities in your car neat and organized and close at hand by storing everything you need in this 600D PREMIUM QUALITY FABRIC Car Organizer.
The LEBOGNER Car Organize is magnificently designed to suit YOUR needs and offers more space for you to carry your items with you under control.

Benefits Of Buying The LEBOGNER Car Organizer…

★ Customized design fits on the seat of Most Vehicles. Measuring 16” x 8.5” x 4” (40cm x 21cm 10cm).
★ Designed to hold many items used during travel.
★ They fasten to the seat with an adjustable top strap for a secure fit.
★ Designed to stay permanently secure in one position.
★ Deep and sturdy pockets to ensure items do not fall out while driving.
★ Stylish black design that will suit any car interior and can be used for front or back of your seat.
★ Premium high-quality 600D polyester material for a good look and super long life.
★ Water-resistant, fabric for easy care.
★ 100% NO HASSEL Lifetime Guarantee - NO RISK TO YOU!
★ Car Organizer installs in 30 seconds.

Hurry! Keep Your Car More Organized And Cleaner And Make Your Life More Easier By Adding This Amazing Lebogner Car Organizer To Your Cart Today!

Satisfaction Is 100% Guaranteed Or Your Money Back.

✓ With 7 Protective Pockets You're GUARANTEED to Instantly Keep Your Car Organized, Clean And Will Protect Your Car Seats. The Pockets Are Sized To Fit Everything From iPads And Notebooks To Smartphones, Sunglasses, Tissues And Water Bottles.
